alert.note: Alert for Manua; Rose Atoll; Swains Island; Tutuila and Aunuu (American Samoa) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS American Samoa (Pago Pago, American Samoa)
info.headline: High Surf Warning issued January 22 at 4:56PM SST by NWS American Samoa
info.description: ...HIGH SURF WARNING NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL TUESDAY... WHAT...Extremely high surfs of 15 to 20 feet with locally higher sets will impact north facing showers through Tuesday due to strong north swell. WHERE...North shores WHEN...Through Tuesday IMPACTS...Expect some strong breaking waves, shorebreak, and strong longshore and rip currents making water recreation difficult and dangerous. Some coastal erosion is also possible for vulnerable locations. Larger set waves may occasionally impact harbor entrances. Lapataiga mo galu matua maualuluga Ofisa o le tau Pago Pago AS 450 AOAULI ASO GAFUA IANUARI 22 2024 ...UA IAI LE LAPATAIGA MO GALU MAUALULUGAE OO I LE E OO ATU I LE ASO LUA... MAFUAAGA...O auma tetele mai i matu ua mafua ai galu e matua maualuluga e 15 i le 20 futu. NOFOAGA...Talafatai i matu TAIMI...Se`ia oo i le Aso Lua AAFIAGA...Aafiaga mai Fautuaga o Galu Maualuluga...O le a iai taimi e fafati maualuluga ai galu i le matafaga ma le aau, e aave foi le sami e faafaigata ma lamatia ai fuafuaga tumatafaga. E ono tutupu foi nai sologa i talafatai o le atunuu. E iai foi taimi, e ono fafati ai galu i le muliava (gutu) o le uafu. FAUTUAGA/TAPENAGA... Puipuiga/Tapenaga Faatino mo Fautuaga o Galu Maualuluga:Tagata uma o loo tafafao i le matafaga, auau, fa`apea le `au fa`ase`e galu, e tatau ona fa`autagiaina fautuaga uma e aumaia e tagata o loo puipuia le saogalemu ma ia faatinoina ma le faaeteete.
info.instruction: Beachgoers, swimmers, and surfers should heed all advice given by safety officials and exercise caution

area.areaDesc: Manua; Rose Atoll; Swains Island; Tutuila and Aunuu
